summary: When an experienced thief accidentally makes off with a Van Gogh, his partner is kidnapped by gangsters in pursuit of the painting, forcing the criminal to hatch a rescue plan.
cast: Wesley Snipes|Tamzin Outhwaite|Deobia Oparei|Georgina Rylance|Pete Lee-Wilson|Serge Soric|Andrei Ionescu|Elias Ferkin|Bogdan Farkas|Tomi Cristin|Adrian Lukis|Stephen Boxer|Adrian Pintea|Corey Johnson|George Anton|Tamer Hassan|Lisa Lovbrand|Dan Badarau|William Armstrong|Martin Wheeler|Warren Derosa|Vasile Albinet|Zoltan Butuc|Radu Bânzaru|Florian Ghimpu|Hawk Younkins
title: 7 segundos
